entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Wawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:04 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:57 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening then changing to ice pellets mixed with snow before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of ice pellets mixed with snow changing to freezing rain late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature rising to 8 in the evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the evening. Temperature rising to 8 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
